CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(packingArea1__c, "NO"), ISPICKVAL(packingArea2__c, "NO"), ISPICKVAL(packingArea3__c, "NO"), ISPICKVAL(packingArea4__c, "NO"), ISPICKVAL(packingArea5__c, "NO"), ISPICKVAL(packingArea6__c, "NO"), ISPICKVAL(packingArea7__c, "NO")), true, false)
CustomField.label: packingAreaNo
